CHAPTER 1610 Ohio Fire Code

1610.01 1992 edition adopted. 1610.02 Purpose. 1610.03 Application of Code. 1610.04 Enforcement; responsibilities of Municipal Fire Safety Inspector. 1610.05 Compliance required. 1610.06 Posting arson laws. 1610.07 Setting fires which spread. 1610.08 Responsibilities upon discovery of unfriendly fires. 1610.09 Inspections. 1610.10 Sale and use of fire equipment; service and repair of equipment. 1610.11 File and distribution copies. 1610.12 Conflicts of laws. 1610.13 Permit fees. 1610.99 Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Power to regulate elevators, stairways and fire escapes - see Ohio R.C. 715.26

Adoption of technical codes - see Ohio R.C. 731.231

Power to regulate against fires - see Ohio R.C. 737.27, 3737.08

Right to examine buildings - see Ohio R.C. 737.34 et seq., 3737.14

State Fire Marshal - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 3737

Petroleum liquids and gases - see Ohio R.C. 3737.17 et seq.

Dry cleaning and dyeing - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 3739

Gasoline, oils and paint - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 3741

Explosives; fire prevention - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 3743

Driving over fire hoses - see TRAF. 432.26

Fire lanes - see TRAF. 452.18

Arson - see GEN. OFF. 642.09

Fire hazards - see P. & Z. 1270.23
